channel.title: Please help
channel.description:
ok i just started my very first server last night and i have been coding stuff like commands, npc autospawns, npcdrops and stuff like that but some of the codes i put in the server didnt seem to update or thats what i thought it was called. i thought after i put in a code i had to exit the server and client to "update it". then i found out what i was supposed to do was compile it. so i tried it and i got an error like "javac: file not found *.java" so i googled around for a few hours also went throught like 30 pages on this topic and found out that its something to do with the PATH environment variables..so i google around for another few hours and find out that that mean some files put themselfs infront of it or something and i need to fix the PATH so i went to SYSTEMproperties>advanced>environment variables and changed the PATH one to "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin" and edited the compiler to "@echo off title simple compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause"
then i try to compile it and i still get "javac: file not found:*.java" also i looked through a bunch of folders untill i found the actual "javac" file i do have it on my computer.
pleasseeeee help me ahah

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @mynameisjbag mynameisjbag
item.description:
@mynameisjbag wrote:

gah ok my PATH is set to “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin” where my javac file is.
and my compiler is
“@echo off
title simple compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause”

and i still cant get it to work… ffs iv been at this for like 5 hours ahaha
please help

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345
item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

correct the path to your jdk…

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @mynameisjbag mynameisjbag
item.description:
@mynameisjbag wrote:

ok i just started my very first server last night and i have been coding stuff like commands, npc autospawns, npcdrops and stuff like that but some of the codes i put in the server didnt seem to update or thats what i thought it was called. i thought after i put in a code i had to exit the server and client to “update it”. then i found out what i was supposed to do was compile it. so i tried it and i got an error like “javac: file not found *.java” so i googled around for a few hours also went throught like 30 pages on this topic and found out that its something to do with the PATH environment variables…so i google around for another few hours and find out that that mean some files put themselfs infront of it or something and i need to fix the PATH so i went to SYSTEMproperties>advanced>environment variables and changed the PATH one to “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin” and edited the compiler to
“@echo off
title simple compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause”

then i try to compile it and i still get “javac: file not found:*.java”
also i looked through a bunch of folders untill i found the actual “javac” file i do have it on my computer.

pleasseeeee help me ahah
